alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 11:00AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... South Branch Buffalo River at Sabin affecting Clay County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum affecting Norman County. Sand Hill River at Climax affecting Polk County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Marsh River at Shelly affecting Norman County. Snake River AT Alvarado affecting Marshall County. Two Rivers River near Hallock affecting Kittson County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Minnesota... Buffalo River near Hawley affecting Clay County. Snake River below Warren affecting Marshall County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Two Rivers River near Hallock. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 806.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD STAGE. Storm sewers start backing up. Storm sewer valve at TH175 bridge closed. Lift pump inspected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 806.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Thursday was 806.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 802.1 feet Thursday. - Flood stage is 802.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
